question: The International Conference of Global Mothers-2019 has started in which Indian city?
explanation: The International Conference of Global Mothers-2019under the theme “Vasudhaiva Kutumbakam –Family System and Role of Mother” has started in New Delhi. The entire world is indebted to mothers and this is the reason that in all religions and in all parts of the world mothers hold a special position of relevance and reverence. ‘Vasudhaiva Kutumbkam’ has been the guiding light for the Indian family system since time immemorial and ethos and socio-cultural fabric are woven around this perceptive phrase.
